title: QKART E-COMMERCE WEBSITE
description: QKart is an e-commerce application offering a variety of products for customers based on React.
Implemented components based logic for authentication, shopping cart and checkout with responsive design.
Implemented Authentication Service using JWT token from scratch and Cart functionality.

title: AUDIOLY WEBSITE
description: Audioly is showing variety of songs albums, which is based on Spotify.
Design and implemented components based responsive UI for different devices.
Used Carousel and Accordion for showing different types of data.

title: AIRLINE TICKET BOOKING SYSTEM
description: Designed a Scalable air ticket booking app using Microservice architecture.
Wrote REST API Gateway along with separate microservices using Node.js framework
Implemented Authentication Service using JWT token from scratch and inter service communication using RabbitMQ
Designed CRON based Reminder service MVC architecture with segregation done in repository layer, service layer and utils.
Implemented MySQL transactions for critical booking operations.
